statements: UPDATE user_behavior SET login_time = '2022-01-20 08:30:00', behavior_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_behavior SET page_views = 10, username = 'john.doe' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_behavior SET page_views = page_views + 1 WHERE user_id = 123 AND username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 456 AND username = 'jane_smith';
UPDATE user_behavior SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 100
UPDATE anomaly_detection SET detection_timestamp = NOW(), anomaly_type = 'unusual_activity' WHERE user_id = 200
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_pattern = 'LoggedIn' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE anomaly_detection SET anomaly_type = 'SuspiciousLogin', detection_timestamp = '2021-12-05 10:15:00' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE behavior_anomalies SET detection_time = '2021-11-30 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE behavior_anomalies SET anomaly_details = '{"type": "abnormal_behavior"}', detection_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = 202;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE login_history SET login_location = 'New York', login_success = TRUE WHERE history_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE login_history SET login_location = 'New York, USA', login_success = true WHERE history_id = 100;
UPDATE user_profile SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE session_data SET end_time = '2022-02-28 18:00:00' WHERE session_id = 3;
UPDATE user_profile SET email = 'newemail@example.com', first_name = 'John' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE session_data SET end_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', start_time = '2022-01-01 07:00:00' WHERE session_id = 456;
